title: New: Jamie Isaac – She Dried
body:
Longtime CitR favourite **Jamie Isaac** comes into 2014 off the back of one of last years finest EPs, and new cut _She Dried_ suggests an even more exciting direction for the nineteen year old Londoner.

Pinned down by a choppier beat than we’re used to from Isaac, the vocals are stronger, the production is bolder and there’s a much more sensual, dare I say sexual vibe to the track. Check it below.

Pinned down by a choppier beat than we’re used to from Isaac, the vocals are stronger, the production is bolder \[…\]
